original:
The 
This drawing serves as a preparatory study for the draped arm of the Virgin Mary in the painting 
The 

The drawing is rendered on a rectangular sheet of paper measuring 8.6 × 17.0 cm, prepared with orange-red chalk. Notably, three corners of the paper have been cut off, and it is cataloged as number 213 in the collection of Francesco Melzi. The composition features a combination of charcoal or black stone outlines, followed by ink
